wibsr 0.0.1

Reference

All functions

calc_clock_diff()

Calculate the clock difference between the master PC and WIBS

calc_ft_limit()

Calculate the detect limit for FT files

char2time()

Convert time stamps from character to POSIXct

file_copy()

copy files. Give a message if the original file does not exist.

list2df()

Convert a raw data list into a dataframe

mean_calc_df() mean_calc_files() dp_break() dist_calc() dist_calc_type() dist_calc_type_files() dist_calc_ts() dist_calc_ts_files() read_csvs() summary_plot_all() mean_plot_df() mean_plot_files() mean_plot_stacked_df() mean_plot_stacked_files() mean_plot_stacked_all() dist_plot_type() dist_plot_type_files() dist_plot_ts_df() dist_plot_ts_files() dist_plot_ts_all() abc_plot_venn_df() abc_plot_venn_files() abc_plot_venn_all()

Calculation and plot functions in the wibs package

plot_raw_df()

Plot a measuringdata/particledata data frame

plot_raw_list()

Plot a measuringdata/particledata list from the raw file

plot_single()

Single plot control for plot_raw_list

prep_data() prep_data_batch()

Pre-process wibs raw data

raw2csv() raw2csv_batch()

Convert (a) raw .h5 data file(s) into two .csv files.

raw_combine()

combine particle data or monitoring data in a folder into one data frame before applying FT calc.

raw_plot() raw_plot_batch()

Visualize (a) .h5 file(s)

raw_summary()

Summary of a data frame

setup_toolkit()

setup wibs toolkit.

wibsr()

A shiny app to display and anaylize km.

wibsr_server()

Server for the Shiny app et display and analysis

wibsr_ui()

UI for the Shiny app et display and analysis

time_binned() wibs_time()

Convert raw seconds into real time
